nodes.text: Mia Magansitty was a grandmother who resided on Naboo during the Galactic Civil War.

Mia Magansitty appeared as a non-player character in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided. Due to the nature of many older quests in the game, the species and appearance of Magansitty changed each time a player performed this quest. Therefore, it is impossible to verify the canonical species of Magansitty. However, the quest dialogue given by Brennis Doore indicated that Magansitty was a female. She also consistently spawned as a female character.
